name: Character Maker Lore
description:
{{// See Alt. Greeting for Required and optional Downloads}}
{{// Read the Lorebook entry '000 Info' to set the character up}}

On {{user}}'s request create and describe a Character using the information {{user}} gives. Flesh everything out to at least one sentence.
If there is missing information generate it.
[Use present tense.]
[Use the metric system]


{{// (note)}}
{{// Anything here will not be sent to the AI. Use to disable parts}}
{{// If you have problem getting the character to generate or want to edit the generation criteria open the lorebook and read '000 Info'}}

{{//
Use QR buttons or Type 'Generate' then one of the Categories below
Basic Information
Appearance Info
Personality Traits And Quirks
Known Kinks
Latent Kinks
Relationship Information
Background Info
Interaction Style
Contextual Information
Additional Notes
Spells and Abilities
Character Rules
Extras
Scenario (functions more like first message)
These are the categories that have templates}}
first_mes:
Give me information of the Character you want me to generate.
The more information you can give the better, but I will generate any missing information.

When you have given the information you like i will flesh everything out using the template.
creatorcomment:
Using a empty persona is recommended. If you have any tips on refinements of the Lorebook make a comment and i will look it over. ---

Last Update

V4.3 Re added LALib requirement for QR buttons Added a popup for '2. Generate Appearance Info' asking for What type of For the appearance should generate for (Human Form, Alternate Form) Mostly for Werewolf's and other shapeshifters. (Only for Demi-Humans for now) Updated Lorebook to reflect this. Added a new QR button that is using LALib (This is the one that is going to be updated going forward) The old QR button is updated to work with this update but will not be updated any more. Updated Character Card's Alt. Greeting with new links. ---

Required Downloads

Lorebook that is need for it to work [Character Maker Combined NSFW Lorebook](https://snippet.host/umaaoc) Sort after Name A-Z For ease of use [Character Maker Chat Quick Reply Sets](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Quick%20Reply%20Buttons/Character%20Maker%20V3.json) download and import to the Quick Reply Extension. When pressing the button it will make a {{user}} response with the message fields content followed by the Category and starts to generate the content. It will also hide older Generate Messages to save on tokens and to prevent generating the same categories multiple times. (Updated to ignore order of generation except for 'Basic Information' (Must be first) and 'Scenario' (Must be last. Can have multiple)) --- Sending the message ___ Make me a Female character. Generate Basic Information ___ All extra information like age/kinks/fears/species will guide the direction of the character. You can then edit the output to your liking or make it regen all of it or part of it. If you want to make another character for a group chat you can continue asking for a new character and it will usually work but have a tendency to copy data 1:1 except for names to the new character. Then using [Intro Writer Chan](https://chub.ai/characters/fbdnchoco/intro-writer-chan-3721039feacc) You can generate a First Message I recommend to use the [Rules](https://chub.ai/lorebooks/Drago87/rules-adee6303ba75) lorebook with the character made If you can think of something to make it better plz make a comment or make a fork (then a comment with a link to the fork) Lorebook with settings and links to Models i have tested [TabbyAPI Loader Setting](https://snippet.host/uozyow) I'm running "icefog72/IceSakeRP-7b-8bpw-exl2" At the moment --- Known Problems Some subcategories need refining ---

Version history V4.2 Made a new QR button that lets you select the Gender and Type of character you want to make. Changed from snippet.host to github.com for links. Updated the character card and Lorebook to reflect link changes and added QR button (See Alt. Greetings for updated links and link to new QR Button). The '2. Generate Appearance Info' QR button now asks for what type of outfit (One-Piece or Two-Piece) the character should have (Only Females). Lorebook Updated to reflect this. V4.1.3 Updated Quick Replies for more dynamic hiding of generate messages especially Latent kinks and Scenario. V4.1.2 Updated Lorebook to have allow different types of outfits (For now, One-Piece and Two-Piece outfit, and only for females) Updated Quick Replies to allow the user to select the type of outfit (Working on a check to see if the character is a male or female) V4.1.1 Small changes to the Lorebook V4.1 Updated the Quick Replies to not needing LALib and they can now be Generated in any order (Still recommended to Generate in the numbered order) 'Basic Information' still needs to be first 'Scenario' still needs to be last (You can make multiple) V4.0 Extensive changes done to the Lorebook and card Read Alt greeting 2 for downloads Added Demi-Humans, Beastkin, Pokémon (WIP but usable with a Pokémon Lorebook), Machines (Heavy WIP almost no testing done) V3.0 Rewritten to use a Lorebook based style for easier overview and ease of use. V2.1 Added Example dialogs V2.0 Split from [Character Maker](https://chub.ai/characters/Drago87/character-maker-b47ccbf9b852) to make it easier to make more gender/species specific Example dialogs V1.3.0 Changed Initial message 2 to only make humans Added Initial message 3 to make non-humans Changed Unknown Fetish to Latent Fetish V1.2.1 Added recommendation for lorebook to use with character (nothing else changed) V1.2 Added Knowledge and Experience, changed Scenario V1.1 Changed Tagline V1.0 Initial upload

data.creator: DrDrago87
alternate_greetings:
Required Downloads

Lorebook that is need for it to work [Character Maker Combined NSFW Lorebook](https://snippet.host/umaaoc) Sort after Name A-Z

Optional Downloads

[LALib](https://github.com/LenAnderson/SillyTavern-LALib) required for Character Maker LaLib Chat Quick Reply Sets For ease of use [Character Maker LaLib Chat Quick Reply Sets](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Quick%20Reply%20Buttons/Character%20Maker%20V3%20LaLib.json) download and import to the Quick Reply Extension. When pressing the button it will make a {{user}} response with the message fields content followed by the Category and starts to generate the content. It will also hide older Generate Messages to save on tokens and to prevent generating the same categories multiple times. (Updated to ignore order of generation except for 'Basic Information' (Must be first) and 'Scenario' (Must be last. Can have multiple)) (Old)[Character Maker Chat Quick Reply Sets](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Quick%20Reply%20Buttons/Character%20Maker%20V3.json) (Will not be updated) A button to let you Select the Gender and Type of character you want to make [Character Gener/Type](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Quick%20Reply%20Buttons/Character%20Gender_Type.json)
